name: TechWear Smartwatch X10
short_description: Stay connected and track your fitness goals in style with the TechWear Smartwatch X10.
long_description: The TechWear Smartwatch X10 is more than just a timepiece; it's your personal assistant on your wrist. With its sleek design and advanced features, this smartwatch keeps you connected to your digital world while helping you stay on top of your health and fitness goals. From tracking your steps and heart rate to receiving notifications and controlling your music, the Smartwatch X10 does it all with ease and efficiency.

specs.Sensors: Accelerometer, gyroscope, heart rate monitor, GPS
specs.Compatibility: Works with both iOS (10.0 and above) and Android (5.0 and above) devices
specs.Additional Features: Built-in microphone and speaker for calls, customizable watch faces

points: Stylish design that complements any outfit.
Tracks your steps, heart rate, and sleep patterns.
Receive notifications and control your music directly from your wrist.

name: Urban Denim Classic Jacket
short_description: Elevate your casual look with the timeless style of the Urban Denim Classic Jacket.
long_description: The Urban Denim Classic Jacket is a wardrobe staple that never goes out of style. Made from premium quality denim, this jacket offers both durability and comfort. Its classic design features a button-up front, chest pockets, and adjustable cuffs for a personalized fit. Whether you're layering it over a t-shirt for a relaxed vibe or dressing it up with a pair of chinos, this denim jacket adds a cool and effortless touch to any outfit.
points: Timeless design that never goes out of style.
Made from high-quality denim for durability and comfort.
Versatile piece that can be dressed up or down for any occasion.

main_specs.Pockets: Two chest pockets with button closure, two side pockets

specs.Pockets: Two chest pockets with button closure, two side pockets
specs.Sleeve Style: Long sleeves with adjustable button cuffs
specs.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold, tumble dry low

name: TechGadget Pro Smartphone 2024
short_description: Experience cutting-edge technology with the TechGadget Pro Smartphone 2024.
long_description: The TechGadget Pro Smartphone 2024 redefines what a smartphone can do. Featuring a stunning OLED display, powerful processor, and advanced camera system, this smartphone delivers an unparalleled user experience. Whether you're streaming videos, playing games, or capturing photos, the TechGadget Pro Smartphone 2024 does it all with speed and precision. Plus, with its sleek and modern design, it's sure to turn heads wherever you go.

specs.Rear Camera: Triple-lens setup (48MP wide, 12MP ultrawide, 5MP depth sensor)
specs.Audio: Stereo speakers with Dolby Atmos support
specs.Storage: 128GB internal storage, expandable up to 512GB with microSD card

points: Cutting-edge technology for a superior user experience.
Stunning OLED display and powerful processor for seamless performance.
Advanced camera system for capturing stunning photos and videos.

name: Outdoor Adventure Men's Jacket
short_description: Conquer the elements in style with the Outdoor Adventure Men's Jacket.
long_description: Designed for outdoor enthusiasts, the Outdoor Adventure Men's Jacket is built to withstand whatever Mother Nature throws your way. Made from waterproof and windproof materials, this jacket keeps you dry and comfortable in the harshest conditions. Its breathable design and adjustable features ensure a perfect fit and maximum mobility, making it the ideal companion for your next outdoor adventure.

main_specs.Material: Nylon outer shell with polyester lining
main_specs.Pockets: Two zippered hand pockets, one zippered chest pocket, one interior pocket
main_specs.Hood: Adjustable and detachable hood with drawcord

specs.Material: Nylon outer shell with polyester lining
specs.Seams: Fully taped seams for added waterproofing
specs.Hood: Adjustable and detachable hood with drawcord
specs.Pockets: Two zippered hand pockets, one zippered chest pocket, one interior pocket
specs.Ventilation: Underarm zip vents for added breathability
specs.Extras: Durable YKK zippers, reflective accents for visibility in low light

points: Waterproof and windproof construction for protection in any weather.
Breathable design and adjustable features for a comfortable fit.
Durable materials that withstand the rigors of outdoor activities.

name: ProCapture DSLR Camera 2024
short_description: Capture life's moments in stunning detail with the ProCapture DSLR Camera 2024.
long_description: The ProCapture DSLR Camera 2024 is designed for professional photographers and enthusiasts alike. With its high-resolution sensor, fast autofocus system, and intuitive controls, this camera allows you to capture stunning images with ease. Whether you're shooting landscapes, portraits, or action shots, the ProCapture DSLR Camera 2024 delivers exceptional results every time. Plus, with its rugged construction and advanced features, it's built to withstand the demands of professional use.

specs.LCD Screen: 3.2-inch tilting touchscreen LCD with 2.1 million dots

points: High-resolution sensor for capturing stunning images with exceptional detail.
